jobDescription: Nestled in the heart of the Silicon Valley, Itron San Jose is our engineering and R&D; center for networking solutions. With an extremely innovative, collaborative workforce and a start-up mentality—but with the backing of an established leader in the utility and smart city industries—Itron San Jose is focused on developing and deploying multi-application networks that connect devices, data and people in some of the harshest environments imaginable. Our network solutions are helping transform and digitize the utility business model, connecting smart cities and citizens to critical services, and enhancing the safety, reliability and resiliency of energy and water delivery for customers around the globe. Itron Network Solutions (INS) is looking for a Software Engineering Intern to join our team in San Jose, CA. In this role, you will work side-by-side with Silicon Valley engineers to deliver products that enable network connectivity and security for utilities and other Internet of Things networks.
